items.label: Iphone 9
items.description: The iPhone 9 brings an affordable yet powerful smartphone experience. It features a 6.1-inch Liquid Retina display, A13 Bionic chip, and a single 12MP camera.

items.label: Iphone 10
items.description: The iPhone 10 delivers exceptional performance and stunning visuals. With its 5.8-inch Super Retina XDR display, A14 Bionic chip, and advanced camera system, it's a flagship device.

details.Camera: Triple 12MP Ultra Wide, Wide, and Telephoto cameras

items.label: Iphone 11
items.description: The iPhone 11 boasts powerful performance and impressive features. It features a 6.1-inch Liquid Retina display, A14 Bionic chip, and dual-camera system with Night mode.

details.Camera: Dual 12MP Ultra Wide and Wide cameras with Night mode

items.label: Samsung 9
items.description: The Samsung 9 offers a premium smartphone experience with its stunning design and powerful features. It features a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, Exynos 990 processor, and versatile camera setup.

details.Camera: Triple 12MP Wide, Ultra Wide, and Telephoto cameras

items.label: Samsung 10
items.description: The Samsung 10 is a feature-packed smartphone designed for productivity and entertainment. It features a 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, Snapdragon 865 processor, and pro-grade camera system.

details.Camera: Quad 12MP Wide, Ultra Wide, Telephoto, and DepthVision cameras

items.label: Samsung 11
items.description: The Samsung 11 sets new standards for mobile innovation and performance. With its 6.9-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, Snapdragon 888 processor, and advanced camera features, it's a flagship device.

details.Camera: Quad 108MP Wide, 12MP Ultra Wide, 10MP Telephoto, and 10MP Periscope Telephoto cameras

items.label: Lenovo 9
items.description: The Lenovo 9 offers a seamless smartphone experience with its powerful performance and long-lasting battery. It features a 6.7-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 865 processor, and high-capacity battery.

items.label: Lenovo 10
items.description: The Lenovo 10 is designed to keep you productive and entertained all day long. With its 6.5-inch IPS LCD display, MediaTek Helio G95 processor, and quad-camera system, it's a versatile device.

details.Camera: Quad 64MP Wide, 8MP Ultra Wide, 2MP Macro, and 2MP Depth cameras

items.label: Lenovo 11
items.description: The Lenovo 11 combines performance and style in a sleek package. It features a 6.4-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 750G processor, and versatile camera setup.

details.Camera: Triple 48MP Wide, 8MP Ultra Wide, and 5MP Macro cameras

items.label: One plus 9
items.description: The OnePlus 9 delivers flagship-level performance and photography capabilities. It features a 6.55-inch Fluid AMOLED display, Snapdragon 888 processor, and Hasselblad camera system.

details.Camera: Triple 48MP main, 50MP ultra-wide, and 2MP monochrome cameras

items.label: One plus 10
items.description: The OnePlus 10 redefines speed and performance with its flagship specifications. It features a 6.7-inch Fluid AMOLED display, Snapdragon 898 processor, and advanced camera system.

details.Camera: Quad 64MP main, 48MP ultra-wide, 8MP telephoto, and 5MP color filter cameras

items.label: One plus 11
items.description: The OnePlus 11 offers cutting-edge features and premium design. It features a 6.8-inch Fluid AMOLED display, Snapdragon 898 processor, and Hasselblad camera system.

details.Camera: Triple 50MP main, 48MP ultra-wide, and 8MP telephoto cameras

items.label: iPad Air
items.description: The iPad Air combines powerful performance with a sleek design. It features a 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, A14 Bionic chip, and support for Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard.

items.label: iPad Pro
items.description: The iPad Pro is designed for professionals seeking power and versatility. It features an 11-inch Liquid Retina display, M1 chip, and support for Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard.

items.label: iPad Mini
items.description: The iPad Mini offers portability without compromising performance. It features a 8.3-inch Liquid Retina display, A15 Bionic chip, and compatibility with Apple Pencil.

items.label: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7
items.description: The Galaxy Tab S7 delivers PC-like productivity and entertainment in a sleek tablet form. It features a 11-inch LTPS TFT display, Snapdragon 865+ processor, and support for S Pen.

items.label: Samsung Galaxy Tab A7
items.description: The Galaxy Tab A7 offers immersive entertainment with a large display and powerful sound. It features a 10.4-inch TFT display, Snapdragon 662 processor, and quad-speaker system.

items.label: Microsoft Surface Pro 7
items.description: The Surface Pro 7 is a versatile 2-in-1 device designed for productivity and creativity. It features a 12.3-inch PixelSense display, Intel Core processors, and support for Surface Pen and Type Cover.

items.label: Microsoft Surface Go 2
items.description: The Surface Go 2 is a compact and lightweight tablet perfect for on-the-go productivity. It features a 10.5-inch PixelSense display, Intel Pentium Gold processor, and support for Surface Pen and Type Cover.

items.label: Forfait Basic
items.description: The Basic subscription plan offers essential features for everyday users.

items.label: Forfait Premium
items.description: The Premium subscription plan is perfect for power users who need more data and features.

items.label: Forfait Business
items.description: The Business subscription plan offers tailored solutions for companies and enterprises.
